data.eml:eml: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kaczmarek, Łukasz, Bartels, Paul J., Roszkowska, Milena, Nelson, Diane R. (2015): The Zoogeography of Marine Tardigrada. Zootaxa 4037 (1): 1-189, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4037.1.1
